original_text: Take up the new nature that God has prepared for you. That nature is like God's own nature. Then you will live in a truly good way that pleases God.
korean_text: 하나님을 따라 의와 진리의 거룩함으로 지으심을 받은 새 사람을 입으라

sentences.original_text: that God has prepared for you
That nature is like God's own nature
sentences.korean_translation: 그 본성은 하나님 자신의 본성과 같습니다

sentences.original_text: Then you will live in a truly good way
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 당신은 참으로 선한 방식으로 살게 될 것입니다
